overview_of_class: Advanced course to develop communication skills in Spanish for health care purposes. Emphasis on language skills for the medical field, specialized terminology and vocabulary, and cultural nuances.
name: Spanish for Professions: Health Care
title: WCAS SPANISH 205-0-20 Spanish for Professions: Health Care

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Advanced course to develop communication skills in Spanish for health care purposes. Emphasis on language skills for the medical field, specialized terminology and vocabulary, and cultural nuances.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisite: 201 or AP score of 5 on the Spanish Language Exam

class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Prerequisites apply, see description
subject: SPANISH
